sentences.en: a late rally in the Tokyo stock market
sentences.cn: 最近东京股市的回暖

sentences.en: a mass rally (= large rally ) in support of the pay claim
sentences.cn: 支持加薪要求的大型集会

sentences.en: About 1,000 people attended the rally in Hyde Park.
sentences.cn: 大约有1,000人参加了海德公园的集会。

sentences.en: About three thousand people held a rally to mark international human rights day.
sentences.cn: 大约3,000人举行了一场大会来庆祝国际人权日。

sentences.en: After a brief rally the shares returned to 126p.
sentences.cn: 经过短暂的反弹后，股价回落到了126便士。

sentences.en: After a shaky start, he rallied and won the title in style.
sentences.cn: 虽然开局不顺，但他振作精神，最后漂亮地赢得了冠军。

sentences.en: All patriots belong to one big family, whether they rally to the common cause early or late.
sentences.cn: 爱国一家, 爱国不分先后.

sentences.en: an attempt to rally support for the party
sentences.cn: 为政党争取支持的努力

sentences.en: Before long the dying plants began to rally.
sentences.cn: 快要枯死的植物不久就开始复苏了.

sentences.en: Carlos Sainz of Spain has won the New Zealand Motor Rally.
sentences.cn: 西班牙人卡洛斯·赛恩斯在新西兰摩托车公路大赛中夺冠。

sentences.en: Fellow Republicans rallied to the President’s defense.
sentences.cn: 共和党党员都团结起来支持总统。

sentences.en: He won the last week's rally.
sentences.cn: 他在上周赛车中获胜.

sentences.en: Markets began to rally worldwide.
sentences.cn: 世界各地的市场开始复苏。

sentences.en: Rally round the flag ; boys, rally round the flag.
sentences.cn: 孩子们,聚集到旗子周围, 聚集到旗子周围来.

sentences.en: Some higher officials attended the celebration rally.
sentences.cn: 一些高级官员参加了庆祝大会.

sentences.en: The Bank of England tried to rally the pound.
sentences.cn: 英格兰银行试图使英镑重新坚挺.

sentences.en: The market will soon rally.
sentences.cn: 市场很快会繁荣起来.

sentences.en: The move stopped the pound's decline but failed to bring about a significant rally.
sentences.cn: 这个行动制止了英镑的下跌,但是未能使比价有很大上升.

sentences.en: The rally began in an uproar.
sentences.cn: 大会在一片喧腾声中开始了.

sentences.en: The Tokyo stock market rallied later in the day.
sentences.cn: 当天晚些时候东京股市止跌回升。

sentences.en: They held a celebration rally.
sentences.cn: 他们举行了一次庆祝大会.

sentences.en: They will often rally in a crisis.
sentences.cn: 他们在危机中总能团结在一起.

sentences.en: We decided to hold a rally to put pressure on the government.
sentences.cn: 我们决定举行集会来对政府施压。

words.tran_cn: 团结；重整；恢复；（网球等）连续对打
团结；集合；恢复健康、力量等

phrases.tran_cn: 赛前动员会，鼓舞士气的集会

trans.tran_cn: 集合，重新集合，重整的信号，反败为胜
trans.tran_en: a large public meeting, especially one that is held outdoors to support a political idea, protest etc

trans.tran_cn: 团结；重整；恢复；（网球等）连续对打
trans.tran_en: to become stronger again after a period of weakness or defeat
a large public meeting, especially one that is held outdoors to support a political idea, protest etc

trans.tran_cn: 聚集，集合，反弹，反败为胜，恢复（元气等）
召集，集合，重整，重振，恢复
